name: Memories (itch) (Spidd)
description:
Memories
Simple game made for the Ludum Dare 49  in Godot Engine. The theme was "Unstable".
Link
About game
They say, that before death your life flashes in front of you and you can see all important moments of your life. Thats what Memories is about. Play through the moments of your life till the very end. And remember, that life is about journey, not about destination.
Controls
Move Left and Right with AD (or Arrows)
Jump with W 
E to move with memories
G to zoom out
H to zoom in

Music by Nicolas Jeudy / DARK FANTASY STUDIO

(Everything in game is purely fictional) 
Thank you for playing.


 EDIT (5.10.2021)   Fixed bug that sometimes creates invisible wall between two blocks, which make the game impossible to complete.
